data.quote: There is no path to happiness; happiness is the path.
data.author: Buddha

data.quote: I have chosen to be happy because it's good for my health.
data.author: Voltaire

data.quote: They say a person needs just three things to be truly happy in this world: Someone to love, something to do, and something to hope for.
data.author: Tom Bodett

data.quote: Happiness is not the absence of problems, it’s the ability to deal with them.
data.author: Steve Maraboli

data.quote: Happiness consists more in conveniences of pleasure that occur everyday than in great pieces of good fortune that happen but seldom.
data.author: Benjamin Franklin

data.quote: Be healthy and take care of yourself, but be happy with the beautiful things that make you, you.
data.author: Beyoncé

data.quote: The biggest adventure you can ever take is to live the life of your dreams.
data.author: Oprah Winfrey

data.quote: Beauty is everywhere. You only have to look to see it.
data.author: Bob Ross

data.quote: You can’t stop the waves, but you can learn to swim.
data.author: Jon Kabat Zinn

data.quote: The most important thing is to enjoy your life — to be happy. It's all that matters.
data.author: Audrey Hepburn

data.quote: If you want to be happy, be.
data.author: Leo Tolstoy

data.quote: Da es sehr förderlich für die Gesundheit ist, habe ich beschlossen, glücklich zu sein!
data.author: Voltaire

data.quote: Fast überall wo es Glück gibt, gibt es Freude am Unsinn.
data.author: Friedrich Nietzsche
